mainToken.description: Your main account's token, used for redeeming the gift/nitro.

guildTokens.description: Your alt accounts tokens (Typically multiple with a lot of guilds)  (Split multiple tokens with ",")

webhookUrl.description: The webhook URL that will be fired once nitro is sniped / a giveaway is won. (Leave empty if you don't want it)

snipeGiveaways.description: Whether you want the sniper to react on giveaways. (true/false | default: true)

snipeGiveawaysOnlyNitro.description: Whether the giveaway sniper should only react to nitro giveaways (true/false | default: false)

dmHosterOnGiveawayWin.description: Whether you want the sniper to dm the host on win. (true/false | default: true)

giveawayWinDM.description: The text to send to the host when a giveaway is won (ignore if dmHosterOnGiveawayWin is off) (default: Hey, i won the giveaway. Could i redeem my prize?)
